name: Hentai Mission Ukraine
description:
After the Special Operation (war), the country of a united and strong people, they sent a spy in order to destroy all the invaders, terrorists and the main dictator Putler. Let the cute and beautiful spy find the old runes of the invaders and find the main secret of Putler's strength and long life.

Hentai Mission Ukraine - a satirical third-person shooter where you play as a spy girl who entered the dictator's territory, you have to collect runes and save the heart of democracy, after killing the dictator and his source of power and his minions driving luxury vehicles.

  • In the game you will find:
  • Dangerous enemies
  • Satiric Boss
  • Different weapons
  • Personal car
  • Multiple quests
  • And a beautiful lady
  • A bit of satirical humor
